RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONCERTI got bumped at the start twice by ASTORIA PARK, who broke inwards, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, then edged clear under a drive to prevail. BOOK OF WISDOM coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, ran on to chase the winner home clear of the rest and along second best. RUN FOR YOUR HONEY hustled from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. AWESOME CZECH hustled from the start, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home and weakened in the stretch. ASTORIA PARK broke in at the start bumping CONCERTI twice, chased briefly just off the inside before tipping three wide down the backstretch, took kickback and chased three to four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Run for Your Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased inside, coaxed 5/16, cut corner, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Concerti
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped 2x st, in hand ins, set down 2w 1/4p, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Bella Cavello Stables, LLC, HorseshoeValley Equine Center,

ENTRY.NAME: Astoria Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2-3w, 3-4w turn, 4-5w uppr, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Book of Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Parkland Thoroughbreds Fowler Barry and Magic Cap Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, ran on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Czech
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 95. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DREAMLIKE saved ground on the first turn, settled while well spotted down the backstretch, drafted in the two path for most of the far turn, was roused while shifting four wide outside the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead in upper stretch then came in some while moving clear, extended the advantage into the final furlong and drew away under steady urging. MOORE'S LAW brushed with a foe at the start, was taken in hand early, traveled around the first turn in the two path, fell well behind on the backstretch, saved ground on the far turn, angled out into upper stretch and was along for the place. MOUNT CRAIG stumbled awkwardly at the start and was last to commence, saved ground on the first turn, tossed his head while tugging on the bit inside the three-quarter pole, moved closer near the nine-sixteenths, saved ground on the far turn, was given his cue at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner under a drive to make a bid into upper stretch, was bumped solidly by HERO'S MEDAL near the three-sixteenths then steadied some, lost touch with the winner outside the furlong marker, battled with the aforementioned opponent for the show to the finish and just earned that position. HERO'S MEDAL went to the front, showed the way while inside to the two path, was given his cue at the five-sixteenths, spun into the stretch in the two path under a drive, came in some and bumped solidly with MOUNT CRAIG near the three-sixteenths, was turned in some while taken in hand, came out a bit from the reaction of the previous bumping and bumped another foe, battled with MOUNT CRAIG to the finish for the show and just missed that position. EXUDE went three wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the far turn, moved to the five path outside the quarter-pole, dropped back into upper stretch and tired. OCASEK prompted the pace on the outside in the two to three path, was asked on the final turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, was bumped inside the three-sixteenths and taken in hand briefly then came up empty. RIDE UP brushed with a foe at the start, steadied while shut off by EXUDE early, went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused near the half-mile pole, traveled three wide around the far turn and failed to respond. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY, HERO'S MEDAL WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FOURTH AND PLACED SIXTH FOR INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Hero's Medal
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace ins-2path,ask5/16,2p1/4,bmpd foe3/16,stdy,bmpd foe,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Mount Craig
ENTRY.COMMENT: stmbld st,ins,toss head5-1/2,ins2nd,rail bid3/16,bmp,stdy,earn3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamlike
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,well placed,2p2nd turn,shift 4w outside1/4,rallied,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Ocasek
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted outside,2-3path,ask2nd turn,bmpd ins 3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Moore's Law
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,in hand,2p1st,well behind,svd grnd,angld out3/16,up2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Ride Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Snyder Richard Snyder Connie Hoppel Jesse Setzer Brett and KEM Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,shut-off early,stdy,3wide turns,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Exude
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,stlkd outside,ask 3w2nd,5w outside 1/4,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 149500. INNER TURF (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At Any Distance Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment DueA t Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIFELOVENLAUGHTER dueled two to three wide while in hand with QUARREL to her outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, floated three to four wide into upper stretch shaking off her main pace rival and drew clear to the eighth pole, then held clear kept to task. MODERN LOVE broke out at the start brushing QUARREL, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. QUARREL brushed at the start by MODERN LOVE, who broke outwards, dueled four then three wide with LIFELOVENLAUGHTER to her inside, came under coaxing when headed for command three furlongs from home, got floated five to six wide when getting shaken off at the quarter pole and weakened in the stretch. STEPHANIE'S CHARM chased four to five wide down the backstretch and then three to four wide through the far turn coaxed along from the seven-sixteenths, spun three wide into upper stretch tiring, and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Lifelovenlaughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, drew clear, held clear

ENTRY.NAME: Modern Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, angled 7w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Quarrel
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, dueled 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Stephanie's Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, coaxed 3-4w 7/16, 3w upper, tired, eased home

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Wilton S. SARATOGA RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 96. Stakes Purse 135000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A SWEEPSTAKES OTHER THAN STATE BRED. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $135 each which should accompany the nomination; $675 to pass the entry box and an additional $675 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $675 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 124 lbs. Non-winners of a state-bred stake lifetime or two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance lifetime or a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance in 2023 allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. Closed
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RANDOMIZED dropped in while showing speed on the first turn, made her way to the rail while coming in front of a foe midway through that bend, showed the way down the backstretch, controlled the action in the two path on the far turn, responded well when asked once straightened for the drive, was guided in while extending the advantage in upper stretch, came under a right-handed crop at the furlong marker and held under steady urging. JUST KATHERINE stumbled at the start but broke with the field, saved ground on the first turn, was rated off the pace, moved up outside the five-eighths pole, was asked along the rail on the far turn, chased the winner in upper stretch, moved out behind that foe near the furlong marker and finished willingly for the place. UNSUNG MELODY showed early speed on the inside, was taken up when RANDOMIZED crossed in front on the first turn then shifted to the two path, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked with a half-mile to run, chased in the three path on the far turn and tired. ACCEDE was taken under a tight hold in the three path on the first turn, raced off the pace under restraint, was given some rein before the nine-sixteenths, went four wide while roused on the far turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Katherine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,ins,mvd up 5/8,ask rail 2nd turn,mvd out1/8,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Unsung Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken up ins-2p1st,stalked out,ask1/4,chsd 3p2nd turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Accede
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold 3p1st,rated,leveled out4-1/2,4w2nd turn,empty,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Randomized
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped in 1st turn,pace,2p2nd turn,ask1/4,responded,driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPIRE SKY chased five wide throughout coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and closed in inside the final furlong overhauling the embattled top pair in the final jumps to the finish to score. RUSSI hustled from the gate, dueled three wide with HENSON to his inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into upper stretch, dug in continuing to knock heads gamely through the stretch to the finish trading a bump near the eighth pole, then was nailed as a pair in the final jumps to the wire. HENSON struck the off side stall at the start, dueled from the two path with the aforementioned foe to his outside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in continuing to engage in head to head combat through the length of the stretch, the rider flashing the crop to the right side when fighting on gamely but was nailed in concert with his main pace rival by the top one in the final strides. SCHERZANDO four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. STREET ROD chased along the inside, scraped the paint through the turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, cut the corner nearly leaning on the rail into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong from home, then flattened out in the late stages. WHISKEY AND WINE got bumped solidly at the start by KID KREESA into CHARMING JIM and then got taken in hand when soon behind those foes due to the pressure, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into upper stretch and weakened. KID KREESA broke in at the start bumping WHISKEY AND WINE into CHARMING JIM, chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact. CHARMING JIM got bumped at the start by WHISKEY AND WINE due to pressure from KID KREESA chased three then two wide, came under coaxing along the inside at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Henson
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, dueled 2p, set down 2w 1/4, dueled str, game, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Street Rod
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, scraped paint turn, cut corner, bid, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Russi
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, dueled 3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w uppr, dueled str, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Charming Jim
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey and Wine
ENTRY.OWNER: Woodford Racing LLC Lane's End Racing Phipps Stable Langone Ken and Hudson Jr Ed
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Kreesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, angled 7w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 6w upper, dug in, up last jumps

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Forty Oaks Farm, Mahoney Eden Manor,LLC & Classic Bloodsto

ENTRY.NAME: Scherzando
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 4-5w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 149500. INNER TURF (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE DEVIL was coaxed to the front, raced inside on the first turn, was well rated while showing the way off the rail down the backstretch, came under urging in the two path midway through the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch, responded well in the drive and drew off under a solid hand-ride to win ridden out. OGLETHORPE went around the opening bend in the two path, stalked the pace on the outside, was given his cue in the three path with three furlongs to run, chased the winner under the crop late on the far turn, was driven five wide into the stretch and proved no match while clear for second. ALFIO angled in nearing the first turn, saved ground going around that bend, was rated at the back of the trio, came under urging late on the backstretch, went around most of the turn in the two path, was put to the crop outside the five-sixteenths, moved to the rail outside the quarter-pole and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed,ins1st,pace off rail,ask2p2nd,4p1/4,drew off,ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Oglethorpe
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC R A Hill Stable Gargan Danny and Sileno Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,stalked outside,ask 3p2nd turn,chased,5p1/4,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Alfio
ENTRY.OWNER: Quartarolo Anthony T Granata Thomas J Quartarolo Ashley and Meyers Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,ins1st,rated 2p,ask7/16,2p-ins2nd turn,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 42000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSTIN SHOUT coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch, traded bumps with HEIR PORT near the eighth pole, then took command at that station and edged clear to the finish kept to task. HEIR PORT hustled from the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, traded minor bumps with the aforementioned foe near that station, dug in weakening late and just held for the place honors. HIGH TONE chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the show honors in a blanket finish behind the winner. NO MORE TALK coaxed from the gate, raced four then three wide in aim of the top pair, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. FIRST DEPUTY chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid to share in the last major share with NO MORE TALK on the wire. STRIKING SPEED prompted the pace of HEIR PORT from the outside three wide, then got joined by NO MORE TALK and loosely pressed the pace between foes through the turn under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, tired in the stretch. GANDY DANCING six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, faltered, and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Gandy Dancing
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, faltered, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Shout
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, cut corner, trade bumps, up 1/8, edged cl

ENTRY.NAME: dh-No More Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 4-3w in aim, coaxed 5/16, 5-6w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.OWNER: Corms Racing Stable and On The Rise Again Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3-2w turn, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.OWNER: Begg James Bentley and Upland Flats Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 5-6w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R Imperio Michael and Scuderi Vincent S
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, in hand 2p, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, collared 1/8, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Speed
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables and Acqu
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 99. Claiming Purse 80000. (UP TO $13,920 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $40,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THINKABOUTIT hit the outside of the gate at the start, settled on the inside, checked sharply when shut-off at the nine-sixteenths and lost position, saved ground on the turn, was asked at the five-sixteenths, turned into the stretch the two path, angled out at the three-sixteenths, rallied while remaining on his inside lead to make a bid into the final furlong, passed the sixteenth-pole on even terms for the front, swapped to the proper lead when pulled in by the rider late and got up under strong handling. CEES GET DEGREES charged the front of the gate just as the latch was sprung, broke clearly in front while veering out in front of foes, bothered several rivals in the process, lugged out while setting the early pace, moved in near the nine-sixteenths, lugged out under extra left-rein pressure in the three path on the turn, responded well under the crop while taking a more straight path in the stretch, led into the final sixteenth but was caught while able to get the place. HAPPY FARM was forced out at the start then taken up some, settled just off the pace, came in near the nine-sixteenths and shut-off the winner, saved ground while asked on the turn, made a rail bid at the five-sixteenths, turned into upper stretch on even terms for the lead, fought under a drive into the final sixteenth and was outfinished while able to get the show. PRIME FACTOR stumbled at the start then was taken up twice, settled on the outside, moved closer late on the backstretch, went four then five wide on the turn, was roused in the vicinity of the five-sixteenths, chased outside in the stretch and lacked the needed kick. EMERALD FOREST was forced out at the start, tracked the pace on the outside, was given his cue in the four path on the turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. NIFTY broke in and brushed with a foe, settled on the far outside at the rear, went five wide on the turn and failed to rally. RAM brushed with a foe at the start, settled on the inside of a rival at the back, went three to four wide on the turn and lacked the needed response.

ENTRY.NAME: Thinkaboutit
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,ins,checkd sharply4-1/2,ins,ask5/16,mvd out3/16,rally,up

ENTRY.NAME: Cees Get Degrees
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer out brk,bother foes,lugged out,mvd in4-1/2,lug out 3p,caught

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out brk,tkn up some,came in 4-1/2,ins,bid5/16,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out brk,tracked outside,ask 4p turn,chased,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Prime Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stmbld brk,tkn up twice,settld,closer1/2,4-5w,lckd needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ram
ENTRY.OWNER: Baker Christina and Mack William L
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,settled inside foe,3-4path turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Nifty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,brushed,settled outside,near back,5w turn,no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Coronation Cup S. SARATOGA RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Stakes Purse 150000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and an additional $750 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4%to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a graded sweepstake allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake lifetime or two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance in 2023 allowed 4 lbs.; o f a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state bred allowance in 2023 allowed 6 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, July
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNIFIED ALLIANCE dueled early on three then two wide with ANNA'S ARABESQUE to her inside, had that rival ease off at the nine-sixteenths and held sole command just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing just inside the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, edged away under a drive kept to task. ANNA'S ARABESQUE dueled early on inside of the aforementioned foe before easing off with nine-sixteenths to go, chased along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. L STREET LADY chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, continued three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. WILDHAWK stumbled at the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Anna's Arabesque
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early ins, eased off 9/16, ins turn, 2w 1/4, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Wildhawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Unified Alliance
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early 3-2w, led 2p turn, cut corner, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: L Street Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 50000. INNER TURF (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Af tercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGNOLIA MIDNIGHT angled in while going to the front, showed the way on the inside, responded well when asked near the quarter-pole and drew off under steady urging. OUR COUNTRY went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was urged five wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and narrowly earned the place while no match for the winner. MORE THAN WORK was hustled from the gate, went around the first turn in the two path, was well placed down the backstretch, chased in the two to three path on the far turn, came under the crop outside the quarter-pole and proved no match for the winner then just lost the place but earned the show. INVISIBLE WAR saved ground on the first turn, was urged along at the rear, raced inside on the far turn, swung four wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. VALENZAN DAY was hustled from the start, went three wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, dropped back late on the backstretch, came up empty in the four path on the far turn and faltered then was eased in the final furlong but walked off.

ENTRY.OWNER: Forgotten Man Racing Inc and Damiano Dominic
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,urged at rear,ins2nd,4w into lane,no threat

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,urged 5w2nd,no match,earned place

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of BTC
